remarks: Lemma for ~ repizf2 .  If we have a function-like proposition which provides at most one value of ` y ` for each ` x ` in a set ` w ` , we can change "at most one" to "exactly one" by restricting the values of ` x ` to those values for which the proposition provides a value of ` y ` . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 7-Sep-2018.)
statement: repizf2lem $p |- ( A. x e. w E* y ph <-> A. x e. { x e. w | E. y ph } E! y ph ) $.
